MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G53 postcode area of Glasgow, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:18pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:40 PM on Monday, 11 January 2021.
